1.title: Episode #17.1

episode of.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Team captain Sean Lock, Johnny Vegas and Johnny's chocolate bust face guest team captain Alan Carr and Lou Sanders. The Brett Domino Trio join Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, Rachel Riley is at the Countdown board and Jimmy Carr hosts.

2.title: Episode #17.2

episode of.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Team captain Sean Lock, Claudia Winkleman and her kittens face team captain Jon Richardson and Henning Wehn. Nick Helm joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, Rachel Riley is at the Countdown board and Jimmy Carr hosts.

3.title: Episode #17.3

episode of.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Team captain Sean Lock and Joe Wilkinson face guest team captain Richard Ayoade and Aisling Bea. Tom Allen joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, Rachel Riley is at the Countdown board and Jimmy Carr hosts. Sean brings some unusual balloons, Joe fails at math, Tom chastises children's art, Richard obsesses over the switcheroo comedy White Chicks (2004), Rachel and Aisling pull a little switcheroo of their own, and Jimmy takes a dive.

episode of.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (TV Series 2012– )

-1.title: Christmas Special 2018

episode of.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (TV Series 2012– )

-1.plot: Sean Lock and Kathy Burke face Jon Richardson and David Mitchell in the 2018 Christmas Special. James Acaster joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, Rachel Riley is at the Countdown board and Jimmy Carr hosts. Joe Wilkinson also drops by.

imdb.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
akas: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (United Kingdom)
plot: A raunchy spoof edition of _Countdown (1982)_ (qv) with the stars of _8 Out of 10 Cats (2005)_ (qv).::thomaswake16
